data.title: Flint River Community Center
data.text:
Courtenay Johnson, Administrator

153 Flint River Road | Riverdale, GA 30274

Telephone: 770-347-0370

Monday – Friday 8:00 am – 9:00 pm

Saturday 9:00 am- 6:00 pm

Intergenerational Center for All Ages

Flint River Community Center opened its doors in April of 2021. This facility provides recreation and activities areas for multiple generations of families to share. It also features for the first time in Clayton County, a “Black Box Theater” designed especially for live performances with flexible stage and sitting arrangements. The facility has areas for all ages such game rooms, exercise rooms, a multipurpose gym area, and an outdoor splash pod.
